website_summaries.verdict: Like the original Keen Austin, this mid-top version has gained acclaim from reviewers due to its water-resistant properties and versatility. Wearers attested to its comfort and support, even to those who have sustained various foot-related issues. The Keen Austin Casual Waterproof Cleat delivers all the essentials, whether used casually or while working. However, its laces are a different story as many have complained about its qualities.
pros: A large percent of wearers advised that this mid-top delivers moderate arch support
Many of its users confirmed that the Keen Austin Casual Waterproof men’s Cleat is comfortable right away
The shoe could be utilized for lifestyle use and in the workplace, according to several purchasers
Its water-resistant quality has been commended by a good number of commenters
A couple of buyers praised the roomy toe box of the Keen men's Austin Casual Waterproof shoes
One flat-footed customer highlighted the stiff leather and eyelets because it delivers ample support
Despite its bulky looks, some shoppers are surprised that it is fairly light on foot
A person who has bone spurs on his feet advised that this mid-top doesn't need orthotics to experience the optimal comfort
cons: A substantial number of reviewers have complained that the laces are too short and quite stiff
Many of its wearers concluded that the Keen Austin Casual Waterproof Cleat runs larger than the regular size

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect I bought it on January 9th I don't wear it all day or everyday only like (10hrs )2 or 3 day week and this is what happened so far .
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Andres Gabriel Prado

customer_reviews.title: Weird sole shape
customer_reviews.text: I want to like these Keen Austin mid shoes. The leather is nice, they look good and are light in weight. First I bought size 11, my normal sneaker size, but they were big so returned them and got 10.5 which fit perfectly on my wider than D feet. Stand there barefoot on the floor, do your toes rise an inch off the floor? No, they touch the ground! When you walk, they bend. So, why would Keen (or any other company) design shoe soles that the toe of the shoe curves up off the ground one inch? Did someone think this would just look cool? My feet are sore just from wearing these around the house for 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's remorse....
customer_reviews.text: They feel like they run about a half size to large. I am only okay with them since adding a second set of insoles. Very pricey for what I received. Would not buy again. Definitely having buyers remorse. Also, the black dye is staining my white socks and the shoe laces that came with the shoes are barely long enough to tie a knot. I would return but my wife threw out the box.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great casual boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these 3 years ago, finally wore them out. The new ones have funky leather laces and are missing the metal eyelets and hooks. Also cost more (no surprise). Boot is basically the same - comfortable, functional, great sole, and easy to care for. I always order 1/2 size large and put extra insoles inside for arch support. I'll wear these another 3 years...
customer_reviews.author: S. Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Keen Boots are not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I where keen now for over 5 years, sandals, boots etc. The boots that I have rubber from the bottom has separated form the leather of the shoe. Water is now getting in as well quality of the boot is not what they used to make. I don't know if they changed factories or on purpose decreased the quality of shoe but stiches, laces the whole boot does not feel like they used to feel.
customer_reviews.author: Gvozden Dokic

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Keen boots for years now, and have not been disappointed until now. These boots are just uncomfortable to wear, and soles look like cheap plastic. I keep going back to them and trying to make myself like them, but I get disappointed every time. Bought boots in Jan. 2019, and hated ever since. Going to give them away or going into trash.
customer_reviews.author: D. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!  Hope they continue to make these!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my hubby's second pair of these AWESOME shoes!! the last pair lasted for more than 2 years!! Needed a new pair! Hope they last as long as the original pair did!!!
customer_reviews.author: NkMorins

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Winter boots, not to soft not to stiff, just right!
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern boot, but laces are too short. I suggest 45 inch laces. Roomy toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Nekcohm

customer_reviews.title: Larger than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Like one of the other reviewers said, the shoe is larger than a normal pair of Keen's in size 9 - at least a half size bigger. I have five other pair of Keen shoes in size 9 that fit perfectly... Thick socks or an extra insole will help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keen Casual Boot - great for walking
customer_reviews.text: The Keen Casual Boot is a great for everyday walking with and doesn't bunch your toes together.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, they are solid, and super comfortable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gib

customer_reviews.title: Good casual boot.
customer_reviews.text: Nice broad fit... typical for Keen. Maternal and workmanship are good. Down graded to 4 because of short laces. I had to not use the upper eyelets in order to tie the shoes with the laces supplied. Not a deal killer but a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: dhl

customer_reviews.title: I’ll fitting
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made (especially for the price). I’ll fitting compared to the many other Keens boots that I have purchased through the years.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Tongue dug into ankle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the comfort reviews came from. Try a pair of Ecco's
customer_reviews.author: SBNP

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, great looking, and great wear and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing keen boots for years and find them extremely comfortable, especially the wide toe box ! The quality is superb to most others and seem to keep there quality beyond there wear limits !
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these shoes they stained my feet black thru my socks but after wearing them multiple times they are broken in and no more stains.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Scott Secrist

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking, not comfortable like the targhees
customer_reviews.text: Didnt feel like there targhees, the way the heel was pushed ypur toes to the front of the boot. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already owned a different color.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are what I expected. So far so good. No real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Will V.

customer_reviews.title: Keen boots are comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these before. Always just as expected. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: The keens are great! Just like the picture. Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bill K Gray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy boots, took no time for breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, used for every day, looks good for work or after words. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit, very comfortable, like a sneaker. Waterproof is definitely a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudio M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality .
customer_reviews.text: Its a good quality product and love the brand.Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Polansky

product_meta.title: KEEN Austin Casual Boots Brown
product_meta.description: For premium protection during less arduous adventures in the city, you can't go far wrong than the Men's Austin Casual Waterproof Boots from KEEN. Whilst under their lifestyle range, KEEN has applied their technical hiking knowledge and crafted a hard-wearing, water-resistant and mid-height lace-up boot that is suitable for the strolling and commuting during the colder months. The leather is also sourced from responsible tanneries that are certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), whilst using a PFC-Free durable water-resistant coating and Glue-Free construction throughout with an additional PFC-Free durable water repellent coating.
feature_bullets: Removable EVA footbed with arch support for all-day comfort
Non-marking rubber outsole leaves no trace
